WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing old Fixed defects.... Esp. since there's been quite a few builds since these were marked fixed.  Any new instances of those issues should be created in new defects.
WorkItem.Description:
Veteran of the 3rd War seems to only grant 3% Strength instead of 6% like tooltip and ingame-values reflect.
Miss chance seems to be to high. Even if we can't be sure of the miss cap, it's most likely 16 (see http://elitistjerks.com/1053037-post335.html).
My miss chance at 544 def should be around 13.77 (4.4 base, 2 racial, 3 talent, 5.77 before DR -> 4.37 after DR).
Rawr displays a miss chance of 14.74, which might be a calculation error, or might be the result of a suspected miss cap of ~46. Either way, I'd suggest looking into it.
Â 
Also, Parry Chance is too high. At 560 Parry Rating and 14% from Swordshattering/Blade Barrier, Rawr displays 33.67 against level 80, while my character sheet
and my own calculations show a parry chance of 31.38 against level 80. considering that I'm missing 30 str in rawr, due to the Veteran bug, the displayed parry
chance should be slightly lower, not >2% higher than the ingame values.
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] Veteran of the 3rd War + Avoidance Values

Comments.Message: To add, these values are taken from the 2.2 Beta Version of Rawr.
I've done some work here, but not sure if it's completely ironed out.  There are more changes in the pipe, so leaving this as active until I've for-sure submitted what I think are the changes.
Marking this out at fixed.  V3W looks right.  I'm sure there's more tweaking as I fix the talent code in general.
